com.isbx.locationtools.animations

Class MarkerAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.animation.Animation
      • com.isbx.locationtools.animations.MarkerAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class MarkerAnimation
extends Animation
    An implementation of Animation to animate both the position and rotation of a Google Maps Marker.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.view.animation.Animation

        Animation.AnimationListener, Animation.Description

    • Constructor Detail

      • MarkerAnimation

        public MarkerAnimation(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker,
                       com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng endPosition,
                       float endRotation)
        Creates a new MarkerAnimation that will animate both the position and rotation of the given marker.
        Parameters:
        marker - The Marker to animate
        endPosition - The final LatLng position of the marker
        endRotation - The final rotation of the marker in degrees
        See Also:
        Marker.setPosition(LatLng), Marker.setRotation(float)

      • applyTransformation

        protected void applyTransformation(float interpolatedTime,

      • setLatLngInterpolator

        public void setLatLngInterpolator(LatLngInterpolator latLngInterpolator)
        Sets the LatLngInterpolator this animation will use for animating the position of the marker. Defaults to LatLngInterpolator.LinearFixed.
        Parameters:
        latLngInterpolator - A LatLngInterpolator to use for position animation
        See Also:
        LatLngInterpolator
